main: ^Always. Bar's busier with folk celebrating and all, but I've still got time for you.
^For listening, during all that. I think most people were afraid, thought I'd crush their heads or something.
^Don't mention it. Kinda my job, y'know?
^You've gotten us out of the frying pan, sure, but who's to say there isn't still a fire out there?
^I am worried that you're not wrong.
^I feel in my gut that something is still lurking around the valley, or maybe beyond.
^Well, if there is, you're always welcome to drop by for a drink the next time you're bloodier than Mary.
^I just might take you up on that.
